abstract: San Francisco coroner's report shows Mario Woods had 20 gunshot wounds, including six in the back, and had drugs in his system when he died; Woods, who was black, was shot dead by San Francisco police, setting off protests and calls for police chief's firing.
lead_paragraph: An autopsy report shows that a man shot dead by the San Francisco police had 20 gunshot wounds when he died in a shooting that led to protests.

headline.main: California: Man Killed by Police Had 20 Wounds
headline.print_headline: California: Man Killed by Police Had 20 Wounds

snippet: An autopsy report shows that a man shot dead by the San Francisco police had 20 gunshot wounds when he died in a shooting that led to protests.
